title: What Does the Pregnant Man Emoji Mean? 🫃

steps.title: The 🫃(pregnant man emoji) represents pregnant trans and non-binary people.
steps.content: The 🫃(pregnant man emoji) represents pregnant trans and non-binary people. Individuals who identify as transgender (a different gender identity than what they were born as) or non-binary (a gender identity outside of the male/female gender binary) are capable of becoming pregnant, though they don’t necessarily identify with the traditional pregnant woman emoji. The pregnant man emoji gives members of the trans and non-binary community more freedom to digitally express themselves during their pregnancy journey. [1] X Research source Upon its release, the emoji was met with mixed reviews from different communities. In general, Unicode (the non-profit organization that manages emojis on a widespread level) supports the use of gender-neutral emojis as a means of providing emojis for people of all backgrounds (not just non-binary and trans individuals). Default emojis with bright yellow skin rather than a distinct skin tone or gender characteristics are good examples of this. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The pregnant man emoji can be used to represent a "food baby."
steps.content: The pregnant man emoji can be used to represent a "food baby." You know that super-full feeling you get after enjoying a really filling meal (known to some as a "food baby")? Pregnant emojis of all varieties are great ways to showcase that experience. [3] X Research source “Ugh, why did I eat 20 McNuggets in one sitting…🫃” “Thanksgiving was great!🦃🫃”

steps.title: Use the pregnant man emoji to discuss your pregnancy.
steps.content: Use the pregnant man emoji to discuss your pregnancy. This is a great option for pregnant trans or non-binary individuals who identify with the masculine presentation of this emoji. Whether you’re texting a friend or posting on social media, use this emoji to add a little visual emphasis to your content. [4] X Research source “I think it’s safe to say I’m in the second trimester…🫃” “I’m officially done with this pregnancy LOL. 🫃 Is it April yet?!”

steps.title: Discuss a big meal you recently ate with the pregnant man emoji.
steps.content: Discuss a big meal you recently ate with the pregnant man emoji. Just get back from a buffet or a big family dinner? Share how full you are in a text message or social post, using the pregnant man emoji to really drive your point home. [5] X Research source "🫃 It turns out the chicken wings at Applebees really are endless!!" "That dinner is giving me the biggest food coma of my life...🫃"
